City Administrator

* City Departments
  /
* [City Administrator](https://www.cityofgroesbeck.com/page/admin.ca)

* Contact Information
  ▲

  City Administrator's Office
  402 W. Navasota St.
  Groesbeck, TX  76642
  254.729.3293

The City Administrator is appointed by the City Council and is responsible for the administration of all operations of the city. He is responsible for making recommendations concerning policies and programs to the council, implementing policy decisions made by the council, preparing and submitting to the council an annual budget and as the Financial Officer is responsible for its administration after adoption, and keeping the council advised of the financial condition and future needs of the city.

Groesbeck Texas -
A Great Place
to Live, Play, and Work
